title: Did U.S. Sen. Mitch McConnell Own a Cargo Ship Found Carrying 90 Lbs. of Cocaine?
subtitle: A relatively small amount of cocaine was discovered by the Colombian Navy hidden on a boat belonging to a company owned by Mitch McConnell’s father-in-law.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Some 90 pounds of cocaine was found on a cargo ship owned by U.S. Senate Majority Leader and anti-drug politician Mitch McConnell.
